nodes.name: Łukasz Rej
nodes.profile: Frontend developer working with React.js, JavaScript and Typescript. In 2019 worked as a Frontend Developer in the Danish e-commerce company - Miinto. Then moved to Agora SA and started gaining professional experience working with React.js. Before that I've used to work as an accountant in a finance-departments.

tasks: Ad hoc job with advertisement development in plain JavaScript
Work with plain JS, Twig (template engine), SCSS
Creation of administration and SEO panels (Bootstrap, jQuery)
Co-working on library of internal components (React.js)

points: Typescript for typing, Ant-Design as components library
